original_title: Chetor jorata kardi in arezooie mozakhraf ra bekoni
overview: Prominent filmmaker, artist and actress Mania Akbari reclaims her body—and that of all the other women in Iranian film. Using almost a hundred excerpts spanning Iran's film history, from the silent era to just after the Islamic Revolution—films that have all since been banned—she tells a story of liberation, exploitation, emancipation and ultimately oppression.
title: How Dare You Have Such a Rubbish Wish
